title: BRANCH SWITCH(EC CAMPUS)
content:
What is the CGPA required for branch change from ECE to CSE in EC campus and for ECE EC campus to ECE RR campus.

A lot of people were saying that it starts at about 8 CGPA.  


Could someone please help me with the previous year's stats.  
Thank you!

comments.body: 8?Lmao u should top in first year, in prev years the top was usually 10.

There is no *cutoff* CGPA. It depends on the performance of the batch in the first year. Preference is given in order of CGPA - first the highest CGPA, then second, and so on. The batch before you is still in first year, so last year stats aren't available, but shifting to ECE usually needs atleast around 8.7-9. Shifting to CS is even tougher, around 9.7+. Note that this is also possible *if seats are available*. If no seats are available, you cannot switch.
Idk about ec campus but rr campus top was 10 but most probably ec campus top grade might also be 10(source:heard somewhere)
